title: Economic Model Design for Smart Gated Communities: Building Self-Sustaining Futures in Lagos
description: We’re developing a smart gated community in Lagos and need a freelancer to design an economic model that supports a self-sustaining ecosystem. The model should balance real estate, energy, utilities, commerce, and community services to ensure both profitability and long-term resilience. The right partner will help us structure a blueprint that blends financial viability with innovation in sustainable living.

milestones.title: Phase 1 – Research & Benchmarking
milestones.description: Analyze comparable smart community projects worldwide, assess Lagos’ local economic conditions, and map out regulatory, infrastructural, and demographic realities that shape feasibility.

milestones.title: Phase 2 – Model Design & Simulation
milestones.description: Develop a detailed economic framework incorporating revenue streams (housing, services, retail, energy), cost structures, and reinvestment loops. Run simulations for sustainability, scalability, and resilience under different growth and risk scenarios.

milestones.title: Phase 3 – Implementation Roadmap
milestones.description: Deliver a strategic plan with KPIs, funding structures, and governance recommendations. Provide documentation and presentation materials that investors, policymakers, and community stakeholders can easily understand and act upon.
